name: github
summary: GitHub REST API client for managing repositories, issues, pull requests, and more.
use_when: User wants to interact with GitHub repositories programmatically
User says 'GitHub API', 'create issue', 'list PRs', 'repository info', 'GitHub automation'
User needs to automate GitHub workflows (issue triage, PR management)
User wants to build autonomous agents that interact with GitHub
User needs to fetch, create, or update GitHub resources
avoid_when: User wants to use Git directly (use system git commands)
User needs GitLab/Bitbucket APIs (GitHub module is GitHub-specific)
User wants local git operations without API access
